reviewText: IT WAS GREAT INFORMATION. IT HELPED ME SEE ALL OF THE PROPHECY THROUGH OUT THE BIBLE. ALSO HOW TO INTERPRET PROPHECY. IT WAS VERY INTERESTING. VERY PRACTICAL. THE BEST SPEAKERS ON THE SUBJECT.

Dr. Tim LaHaye and others again show us the significance and importance of studying Biblical prophecy in our own personal lives. These informative programs are great for both personal and classroom use. You don't need to be a fan of "Left Behind" to appreciate LaHaye's insights which of course comes from his great knowledge of the Sacred Texts. With Bible and notebook in hand, I am very pleased with the quality of this set of DVDS.
I love these because I love the ministers and this is the truth of what to expect in years to come as planned by God.

Yes;  I read the reviews.  I knew it was not like the books before I purchased it.  I bought the series with the intention of using it as a Bible study.  There was a lot of "this is what the Bible says"; but there was not really a whole lot of scripture referenced.  I'm from Missouri...SHOW ME where to find the scriptures!
stunning.  hair raising.  praise god.  this book will really make u search the bible and your soul and relationship with the lord.

Please be aware of the difference between the scholars disecting
and the actual movie. Thought I was buying movie got the discussion. too bad amazon didn't think to make the distinction for it's customers!!!  My review...this set stinks!

One of the most awesome and moving series about the end of days.  Christian beliefs and values are prevalent but the story line keeps you interested telling the story but not over religious.  Highly recommend this for anyone of any age of any belief.  I have read the whole series and the movies are marvelous
It wasn't what I thought I wanted the movie not the documentary...
Painfully boring.  Couldn't even get past the first disc.
Just ordered it.  But I have read a lot of Tim Lahaye's books and have seen movies made from them.  I cannot wait to get this!
Read all the Left Behind books and now the prohecy discs.  Enjoy them very much

Tis is the series for anyone interested in end times Bible studies.  This series is not only Biblically accurate it is very well done and keeps the viewer engaged all the time.  You are left wishing there was more video each time the DVD ends.  I highly recommend this series!
I thought I ordered the movie series not a series of lectures.  I reread the description of item.  I don't feel the description is very clear.

I thought that it was the movie series and not lecture series, so I was disappointed in that it was totally not what I thought I was ordering.
I would not have ordered this had I known it was the lecture series and I feel that it is not clear in the description.
